ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] PA raid
ygData.msgSnippet: Tried tat last Friday night.  As the time is ard 6pm plus and most of the alliance in ToV, only can get mainly twinks to help.  Got like 10 persons (thx to
ygData.messageBody:
Tried tat last Friday night. As the time is ard 6pm plus and most of the
alliance in ToV, only can get mainly twinks to help. Got like 10 persons
(thx to Niefeng and Trifrost casting water breathing spells to 2 parties).

Unfortunately, another grp of TD pple somehow get the news (dunno it's
coincident or news leak out). When I use druid to track for PA 1 hrs ago,
no pple in the zone, anyway... I tried using the eye of tallon to pull.
Except for the 1st time it falls into PA's hole (but didn't aggro PA coz
the eye swim slow and didn't manage to get near it), the other 20 over
times the eyes dunno fall to where. In the end we decided to rush in
(invis all the way) with Caio leading (he got several KK raid, so familiar
with the place). When we reach the ledge, TD grp already fighting but they
died, muhahah. Then we proceed to kill PA, some SS and SG. SG drop a
haste belt (won by Suzuka, the only enc in the raid and died also coz aggro
via mez), PA drop enc and shm rod (both rot coz Tri is the only shm and he
dun need rod, suzuka died).

When using 51 druid to track, the SS are all lvl 51, SG blue, only PA con
yellow. Since SS and SG drop nice stuffs (eg the all/all tradable haste
belt, good for twinking melee class), dun mind go there often to practice
abit ;)

Now parking druid at KK zone in with invis and FB earring, soaked him 24
hrs tracking for PA. Btw, the 10 person who went for the raid, mostly are
55 and below, think only me (wiz), caio (rog) and suzuka (enc) above 55.
Half are local kakis, thx to their help :)

On 27 April, 2001 4:50 PM, Matthew Tan [SMTP:leshrec@...] wrote:
> Safest if pull with level 59 or 60 since before that, guardians sure will
> agro too. As for wall, just cast eye on right wall from zone, then eye
will
> drop into phinny lair, some of the seahorse see invis ( I con them while
in
> eye view, most con indifferent only some con scowl). Anyway, you just
want
> phinny to see the eye so he comes alone, but theres a bug there that
> sometimes the invis will drop just as phinny nukes it and will bring
train..
> Just zone if thats the case and zone back in, from what I know, Phinny
stays
> at zone in longer than the average seahorse so np to fight him later.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: K. W. Lee <kw.lee@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, April 27, 2001 3:24 PM
> Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
>
>
> > Hmm, then I shld be able to cast wiz 58 eye spell (invis eye). Can ask
> for

Also

attack
> > me when casting spell.
> >
> > Btw, are KK mobs 100% aggro (ie aggro regardless of lvl) or won't aggro
if
> > ya lvl is high 50ish (eg 58-60)?
> >
> > Anyway worst case if kena train, can easily zone out right?

Phinigel
